name: A Long Day on My Farm
name_original: A Long Day on My Farm
description:
A quick co-op game you can play with your farm.  In the style of dinner dash or Overcooked you should cooperate and aim for the highest score. 

How to play:
Interact with various objects, collect resources based on orders and deliver them to a delivery car.

Control scheme:
Player 1: Arrows, Enter
Player 2: WASD, Spacebar

Technical note:
Best played in 1920x1080 resolution
